original_text: And the thing was known to Mordecai, who told it unto Esther the queen; and Esther certified the king thereof in Mordecai's name.
korean_text: 모르드개가 알고 왕후 에스더에게 알리니 에스더가 모르드개의 이름으로 왕에게 아뢴지라

sentences.original_text: And the thing was known to Mordecai
who told it unto Esther the queen
and Esther certified the king thereof
